sentence.text: By way of whole-exome sequencing, we identified a homozygous missense mutation in valyl-tRNA aminoacylation in one subject with microcephaly and epilepsy associated with isolated deficiency of the mitochondrial respiratory chain (negative regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity) complex I and compound heterozygous mutations in threonyl-tRNA aminoacylation in two siblings presenting with axial hypotonia and severe psychomotor delay associated with multiple negative regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity defects.

entity.text: negative regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity

sentence.text: Expression of the corresponding wild-type transcripts in immortalized mutant fibroblasts rescued the biochemical impairment of mitochondrial respiration and yeast modeling of the valyl-tRNA aminoacylation mutation confirmed its pathogenic role.

Our study reports the first mutations in the valyl-tRNA aminoacylation and threonyl-tRNA aminoacylation genes, which encode two mitochondrial aminoacyl-tRNA synthetases, as causes of clinically distinct, early-onset mitochondrial encephalopathies.
